alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 1:40AM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Far northeastern Pennington County. * WHEN...Until 815 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 138 AM MDT, Doppler radar and trained spotters indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms yesterday evening. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Creighton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
